channel.title: Portfolios on Trackclub
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Trackclub

item.title: Weeklies
item.description: Since September 2020 we’ve been jamming, arranging and mixing new tracks into weekly playlists …

item.title: RIFFF SAMPLER
item.description: Tap the swirls to play a mix from a recent jam; tap again to mutate which stems are chosen. Click n' drag! Double-tap/click to silence!

item.title: Debut Triptych
item.description: Our first three album releases, Interconnected, Intensity and Imaginary are now available where all fine music is found. Tune in over on Bandcamp or stream from Spotify

item.title: Live Streams
item.description: Merging the improvisational, collaborative magic of Endlesss jamming with beat-synced live generative visuals; stay tuned for more experiments in this space.
